entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person Neville was trying to find and warn. He is also the one who shook his head violently to shut Neville up.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as the person who burst out saying 'Harry!' and tried to warn Harry.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the person who was trying to catch Harry and had a conversation with Neville.

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is mentioned as a dragon that Professor McGonagall compared herself to in terms of her towering presence.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as the teacher who saw Harry and Neville talking and questioned them about their behavior.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Mr. Filch is mentioned as a teacher who reported that Harry and his friends were up in the astronomy tower at 1 o'clock in the morning.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall questioned Harry about his behavior and why he was up in the astronomy tower at 1 o'clock in the morning.
Professor McGonagall also questioned Neville about his behavior and why he was talking to Harry at such a late hour.
Harry is mentioned as the target of Malfoy's threats, who said he was going to catch him.
